moves.name: Tackle
moves.effect: A basic physical attack. No additional effects.

moves.name: Scratch
moves.effect: A basic physical attack. No additional effects.

moves.name: Pound
moves.effect: A basic physical attack. No additional effects.

moves.name: Growl
moves.effect: Lowers the target's Strength by 1 for the rest of the scene. This effect can stack.

moves.name: Leer
moves.effect: Lowers the target's Vitality by 1 for the rest of the scene. This effect can stack.

moves.name: Tail Whip
moves.effect: Lowers the target's Vitality by 1 for the rest of the scene. This effect can stack.

moves.name: Quick Attack
moves.effect: This move has Priority. It is resolved before other moves in the same round, ignoring initiative order.

moves.name: Swords Dance
moves.effect: The user raises its Strength by 2 for the rest of the scene. This move can only be used once per scene.

moves.name: Hyper Beam
moves.effect: After using this move, the user cannot take any actions on their next turn as they must recharge.

moves.name: Giga Impact
moves.effect: After using this move, the user cannot take any actions on their next turn as they must recharge.

moves.name: Body Slam
moves.effect: On a successful hit, the user may roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target is Paralyzed.

moves.name: Protect
moves.effect: The user becomes immune to all damage and effects until the start of their next turn. If this move is used consecutively, it has a cumulative chance to fail (Storyteller's discretion).

moves.name: Double-Edge
moves.effect: The user takes recoil damage equal to one-third of the damage it deals.

moves.name: Hyper Voice
moves.effect: This move hits all adjacent opponents.

moves.name: Facade
moves.effect: If the user is Burned, Paralyzed, or Poisoned, this move's damage becomes Strength + 8.

moves.name: Return
moves.effect: Damage is increased by the user's combined Happiness and Loyalty score.

moves.name: Frustration
moves.effect: Damage is increased by the inverse of the user's combined Happiness and Loyalty score.

moves.name: Strength
moves.effect: Out of combat, can be used to move heavy objects.
